condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; The papyrus is broken at the right hand side before the payments as a result of a vertical fold. A vertical lacuna at the middle of the column to the bottom as a result of another fold. kollesis at the middle of the column. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by mark an oblique stroke going downwards to the left margin.
